snippet.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 SMS/GG 16-Bit ~ Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Save Tails from the clutches of Dr. Robotnik in this complete re-imagining of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for the Master System and Game Gear! Coming to CGS 2024 as a one zone demo, you go through the rocky caves and mineshafts in Under Ground Zone! Be careful though, as a Master Robot also awaits you deep within the zone's depths...

Music used in trailer composed by LunarCryptik!
